Title: DEV-WOW SmartTravel
Description:
SmartTravel is an entry in the DEV-WOW competition but still a real product which is a Windows application based on WPF and Web Service. 
With SmartTravel you can view Sights or the recommanded Journeys by tour agency, find Hotels and manage your personal tour history and much more other tour info on your desktop.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
SmartTravel is an entry in the DEV-WOW competition but still a real product which is a Windows application based on WPF and Web Service.
With SmartTravel you can view Sights or the recommanded Journeys by tour agency, find Hotels and manage your personal tour history and much more other tour info on your desktop.

Solution Summary
Development Applications:
Expression Blend
Visual Studio 2008 Beta 2

Technology Highlights:
WPF/XAML/C#
XML Data Binding
Data Visualization

The Travel Info License
All travel info used by SmartTravel is licensed by http://www.xutour.com which is owned by the CYTS International Department of Chengdu,
Distribute travel info is not allowed. Please check this link for more info:http://www.xutour.com/help/PrivacyPolicy.htm.
